lore.title: Adventurer's Story
lore.summary: I'm Laura, a web developer with a strong interest in 3D and programming. My journey has taken me through different creative and technical fields, from pastry to developing modern and interactive websites. I love learning and constantly seek new challenges, combining design, animation, and development to create unique digital experiences. Explore my story and see how each stage has led me to where I am today!
lore.personalityContent: I consider myself a curious, self-taught, and perfectionist individual with a great passion for technology and design. I enjoy tackling new challenges and constantly learning to improve my skills. I love combining the logic of programming with visual creativity, which allows me to approach web development and 3D modeling from a unique perspective.
lore.pastryContent: Before stepping into the development world, I worked in pastry for several years. I completed a Dual FP program, which allowed me to train in different areas, from artisan pastry-making to working in airport catering and Japanese restaurants. The precision and aesthetic sense I gained during this time have influenced my work approach, as I value both structure and presentation in everything I do.
lore.gamesContent: My passion for video games led me to study a Higher Degree in 3D Animation, Games, and Interactive Environments. During this program, I learned about 3D modeling, texturing, and environment design. Although I haven't worked professionally in the game industry, I continue exploring 3D with tools like Blender and Three.js, applying these skills in personal projects and collaborations.
lore.webContent: I discovered my interest in web development through various courses and training programs. I completed the 'Programa Tu Futuro' with Accenture, where I learned Java and Spring Boot, as well as modern application development. I also took C# courses with Azure and trained in frontend development using tools like React, Bootstrap, and TailwindCSS. Currently, I continue refining my web development skills and exploring new technologies.
lore.experiencesContent: I've participated in various experiences that have shaped my professional profile. In 2023, I joined the 42 Madrid Piscine, where I strengthened my problem-solving and teamwork skills. I worked as a frontend developer at N√úO Planet and as a backend developer at Tragsatec, which allowed me to apply my knowledge in professional environments. Additionally, I have conducted mentorships and specialized courses in 3D and game development to help others learn about these fields.
lore.currentContent: I am currently collaborating with Selene Games on maintaining and updating their website while continuing to develop my portfolio and seeking new opportunities in web development and 3D modeling. My goal is to continue combining my technical and creative skills to deliver innovative digital experiences.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm Laura Fr√≠as, a web developer with experience in frontend and backend. I specialize in creating interactive and engaging digital experiences. I enjoy combining code and design to develop intuitive and optimized interfaces.
